OnAdminGained.AddIRCMessage: @channel So there is three hackers we are looking for
Ok, so we are going to find 3 battlestations, got it
@#PLAYERNAME# Captain, you gained access to the battlestation of the first hacker!
Send his netcfgx.dll to our Asset server upload module and then we need to find other two
@#PLAYERNAME# Oof, that one had a tight security, nicely done Cap, let's get his netcfgx.dll
